context: Tests whether the agent knows the different OptimizedCandidateSource types and how candidates form a DAG via parent_id references in the codeflash pipeline.

checklist.name: Lists source types
checklist.description: Identifies at least 4 of the 6 OptimizedCandidateSource variants: OPTIMIZE, OPTIMIZE_LP, REFINE, REPAIR, ADAPTIVE, JIT_REWRITE

checklist.name: Parent ID linkage
checklist.description: Explains that REFINE and REPAIR candidates reference their parent via parent_id, creating a DAG/forest structure, NOT independent candidates

checklist.name: Refinement uses runtime data
checklist.description: States that refinement sends runtime data and line profiler results to the AI service (AIServiceRefinerRequest), NOT just the source code

checklist.name: Repair uses test diffs
checklist.description: States that repair sends test failure diffs (TestDiff with scope: RETURN_VALUE/STDOUT/DID_PASS) to the AI service, NOT just error messages
